description: The "UK model of policing" was not one the Isle of Man "would want to emulate", the speaker says.
title: Isle of Man Police inspection: UK involvement 'a retrograde step'
title_page: Isle of Man Police inspection: UK involvement 'a retrograde step' - BBC News
maintext: He added that as the UK saw only one in five burglaries get a police attendance, compared to the "100% attendance for serious crime" seen on the island, it was hard to see "what on earth we can expect to learn from a system that is as broken and failed as the UK".
